title: T-Mobile
description:
Your time matters. Save more of it with the NEW T-Mobile app. Manage your T-Mobile account: • Quickly view and pay your bill 
• Check your data, text and minutes across all lines 
• Find the closest T-Mobile store 
• Check your order status Login and manage your T-Mobile account. 

We value your feedback, email us at androidapp@t-mobile.com. View the T-Mobile privacy policy at www.t-mobile.com/privacy.
short_desc: The freedom to get more done with the NEW T-Mobile app.
what_is_new: Prepaid customers – we heard you! We are happy to bring you a first version of the T-Mobile app. But we won’t stop – we are working to make it better! Customers using larger format phones, such as Samsung Note 5, can also now use the NEW T-Mobile app. For all tablet users, we didn’t forget you, we’ll have the new T-Mobile app experience available to you soon as well. Until then, please download the T-Mobile app on your phone or manage your account online.
